caption: Relating to the holding or acquisition of an interest in real property by or on behalf of certain foreign individuals or entities; establishing an agricultural intelligence office; creating a criminal offense.
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from countries under US arms embargo (including China) from acquiring Texas agricultural land and real property. Chinese citizens/entities must report existing property holdings by April 2026 and divest by September 2027. Violations are state jail felonies. Creates agricultural intelligence office to monitor compliance. Affects both individual Chinese citizens and Chinese-controlled organizations.
translation: 该法案禁止来自受美国武器禁运国家（包括中国）的个人和实体购买德克萨斯州农业用地和房地产。中国公民/实体必须在2026年4月前报告现有房地产持有情况，并在2027年9月前出售。违法行为将被判处州立监狱重罪。设立农业情报办公室监督合规情况。该法案影响中国公民个人和中国控制的组织。
committees:
1. Agriculture Livestock Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Criminal Justice Committee
